content.detailedDescription:
In january 1998, my wife had just returned home from an army deployment in bosnia. upon picking her up in nc and returning to tempe, az (our home at the time), we spent an evening reconnecting in our backyard on the trampoline. we hadn't seen eachother in almost 7 months and i was very playful doing backflips and the such to show off. after exhausting myself and coyfully trying to talk her into joining me on the trampoline, she made an observation in the night sky just above me. she observed a descending bright light that we first thougt was an airplane in the pre-dusk sky. i promptly looked up to where she indicated and noticed the same thing. as the light descended, it came to an ubrupt stop, then changed into a bright red, elongated line. as an army aviator i was stunned at what i just witnessed. the light then became a black dot and then "shot" out of the atmosphere. it was not that dark yet and very clear against the bluish sky that it moved faster than anything i have ever seen. 

even though i am not convinced that i witnessed a "ufo", this experience haunts me to this day. my wife and i are extremely skeptical and worldly people, yet we cannot explain the strange occurrence of that night. my gut tells me, but can't convince me that i and my wife witnessed something other-worldly. after 17 years of active duty in the army, i now feel compelled to tell our story, as insignificant as it may seem.
content.summary: Descending yellow light, then red, black spot and gone

content.detailedDescription:
I saw the following happen before my very eyes this afternoon:

i was driving home from work, along us 36 from boulder to westminster, co when i looked up to see a very bright shining object in the sky. it was before the cloudline in my line-of-sight, and it's brightness was quite star-like. 

i slowed my vehicle to a safe enough speed and took a hard look at the object through my windshield. it was like a star shining 2-3,000 feet from the surface of the earth. very bright.

about 10 seconds after my first glimpse of it, before my eyes, the light dimmed and the object slowly morphed into a black/brown 'plane' that then slowly eased off towards the east. i say 'plane' because it was just a very common, small, single-engine craft that was totally black/brown. no identifiers on it at all. 

the 'plane' flew out of view within about 2:30 from my first sight of it. 

how does a burning bright, star-like object simply become a fixed-wing, single-engine aircraft!?
content.summary: Incredibly bright light, stationary then morphs into a civilian plane

content.detailedDescription:
hi, i would like to start by first saying that if we only had the technology that we have today back in 1982 i would of had the best shots or video of the giant black silent triangle. 

after about 28 yrs later of seeing the object i remember it like it just happened and after  watching ufo hunters and now discovering  mufon it brings back memories of that crystal clear sighting. im happy to give a description  to what i saw that fall night inlate sep early oct of 1982.

while pulling into the driveway of our home with my parents in owasco ny about 10 pm my father said hey look at that thing, as we all got out of the car this breathtaking craft just came over are house the size of i would say a home depot of today. it was right over are heads roughly 100 ft. it looked   like  a ship out of star wars it did not make a  sound as it just drifted or floated over are heads it had some white lights but not that big in fact very small i did not see any other colored lights the thing that was so amazing is how large it was and it did not make any noise was totally silent the truth of the matter is if i had a video camera  i don't think i could of used it due to the facti was in such shock seeing this thing. the whole sighting took from 3-5 minutes before it went out of sight.
this was a once in a lifetime experience that has stayed with me my whole life i was 16 then.I read a lot about triangle craft. what  i can say is that the object i saw was going 10 to 20 mph no noise what so ever triangle in shape, 2 football fields large and black and nothing we have today is anything like this no aura ,stealth, human made anything this was from out of this world or maybe they have been here all along.
content.summary: Triangle craft in 1982 in upstate ny.

content.detailedDescription:
I was physically sleeping when a "power" started "pulling" my consciousness upwards. there were loud thunderclaps as i moved through golden circles as if in a vortex.

i looked up and saw a bearded man who looked like jesus and krishna. he was smiling fixedly at me and his eyes were unnaturally large. he appeared to have tongues of fire about his head. his smile seemed to indicate he was pleased with me. around his head was the blackness of deep space. 

i thought why doesn't he ever speak to me in my dreams as we looked at each other. (i have seen this particular being on several occasions.) before i had completed that thought there were three loud syllables uttered. the third syllable ended with a roaring sound and i found my self wide awake in bed.

these experiences have occurred to me so often in my life that as soon as i felt my consciousness being drawn inexorably upward i thought with some irritation: now what?  

this is only one of many experiences.
thank you for your time.
would you please forward this to:

craig r. lang, ms cht
certified hypnotherapist,
       anomaly researcher/investigator
author, the cosmic bridge
ph# 763-257-7334
crlang@mm.Com
www.Thecosmicbridge.Com
www.Craigrlang.Com
content.summary: Experienced being taken "up" within circles of golden light and thunder

content.detailedDescription: On wednesday, october 14th just before 8 om, my brother called me as he was driving back home from tucson. as he was driving in to maricopa, he saw several orange lights appear around the a harrah's casino. my family notices these orange flights somewhat regularly around town, hovering above neighborhoods or on the outskirts near the dairy farms and such. we have no idea what they are. so i hopped in my car and my boyfriend and i drove a couple minute's drive out to west farrell road and n maricopa road/highway 347, right next to harrahs. we saw three sets of bright orange lights hovering above the field behind the casino. the middle set of lights were lower than the other two. we stayed for about 10 or 15 minutes, and in that span of time most of the flights flickered on and off a couple times before completely going out. a couple minutes later, we saw one set of lights reappear a little further to the south west. we used our binoculars, but still couldn't figure out what the light source was. i took a short video of this final set of lights on my iphone before we headed back home.
content.summary: Three sets of orange flights seen hovering behind harrah's casino in maricopa, az.

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of 10-17-09 myself and four other club members were at our astronomy clubs��� observatory (35.8308 96.14518) for a clear night of observing.  with many years of experience in observing under our belts we were needless to say quite qualified to identify most anything that we would see.  between approximately 6:40 ��� 7:00 p.M. one of the members noticed something off in the west and queried as to what it may happen to be.  first and foremost it was bright, more or less as bright as jupiter, yet setting about ten to twelve degrees above the horizon, due west.  at our first sighting most of us thought that it was nothing more than an airliner reflecting sunlight from the setting sun but that determination was tossed aside shortly there after.  if it had been what we first thought it was it would���ve lost it���s size and brightness fairly quick as it shifted positions in relation to the sun while in flight. but, it continued to maintain its position, did not move in any direction - vertically, horizontally.  if by some chance it were a celestial body it would follow a gradual celestial track that all of us would have noticed in a few minutes.  again, it didn���t move, remained in one position, which eliminated the possibility of it being a celestial body that none of us were unlikely familiar with.  that alone became puzzling since the obvious ��� venus, mercury ��� are now tracking in the morning eastern sky, not the evening western sky.  with that we continued to watch it as one of the guys used his 10x50 binoculars to get a better view.  what was seen initially brought to mind that it may perhaps be a high altitude research balloon but the more we watched it and as it maintained its position that thought was tossed quickly also. from the beginning it remained in one position, never moved.  balloons, of any type, will not remain in one specific position be they weather balloons, high altitude research balloons or otherwise. 
but as we watched it more closely it was very surprising as to the manner in which it morphed into various shapes and sizes.  its brightness would vary some but that was easily seen as being caused by the low-lying clouds on the horizon.  as we commonly call it ��� it was ���sitting in the soup���.  when they would move in front of it the objects brightness would dim some.  otherwise it would maintain its brightness.  that was easily seen via binocular observations.  the longer we watched it the more curious we all became and with that growing curiosity we quickly set two telescopes onto it.  two different sized telescopes were used, one, celestron 11��� schimdt-cassegrain telescope and a smaller orion 4.5��� dobsonian telescope.  between the two we could pull it in for a much closer look in a very inquisitive effort to determine just what it actually was.  charts and web sites were checked also to make sure we weren���t simply forgetting perhaps one event that may explain what we were now seeing.  nothing could be found.  the celestron was using a 40mm eyepiece for a much wider field of view whereas the smaller orion had a 15mm eyepiece to pull it in much closer.  through the orion one could easily see what appeared right off as a bell shape.  the same was viewed in the other also.  but as mentioned before it morphed into what was clearly seen and could be interpreted as the same basic outline of the shuttle that anyone would see as it flies over.  again, the same basic shape as to what you would see looking up at the bottom of it. that distinctive shape was easily recognized. at the rear of it you could see what looked like bluish green waves that would both come and go from the main rear line of the object. nowhere else was this color and wave seen, just at the rear.  the objects color was a combination of the just mentioned bluish green at the rear to a lighter orange yellow up through the main body and then into red orange, much more intense, than any of the other colors at the top or perhaps, from appearance at that time, leading edge.  none of us had ever seen a color distribution of this sort before.  especially on either the shuttle or any other normal day-to-day satellites. from our position/location it appeared to be hovering over either bristow, ok or possibly even oklahoma city. there was no attempt by any of us then to determine its specific distance or altitude from us. the same applies to its actual size. visually, it appeared very similar to the size of jupiter. other than that comparison we honestly don���t know either its distance or specific altitude. it remained in the same position for approximately 40 minutes and never moved.  close to 8 p.M. we started to notice what appeared to be a ring of lights that was rotating around the bottom portion. the lights were seen in the same location that the bluish green colored waves were at. several of us noticed this while looking at it through the telescopes. needless to say this was surprising to us all. this carried on for one to two minutes and then suddenly the object started to move. the movement was slow at the beginning but increased very rapidly. i had my eye glued to the 40mm eyepiece when this began and once it started i could not move.  within two seconds it had totally disappeared from open visual sight but i still had a lock on it in the eyepiece. fast, very fast it moved from dead center in the eyepiece field of view upwards and at the same time was getting smaller and smaller as it flew away. two or three seconds later it was totally gone from view in either of the telescopes. the speed that it moved was without question way beyond anything that we have knowledge of or is publicly known to be in our military.  at the rate it flew away would make a sr-71 blackbird look very old and slow. could it have possibly been a new experimental aircraft? possibly yes but if so what was something such as that doing in oklahoma?  most generally new experimental, top-secret aircraft of that type are being tested at either edwards afb or area 51, not oklahoma.  in a nutshell, we will never know.  
it was unidentifiable, it was in the air and flew away and it most certainly was an object of some unknown kind/type. from this alone it could be justifiably categorized as a ufo.
content.summary: The same object was seen by many at the rmcc observatory - mounds, ok as reported from mt. pleasant, tx.

content.detailedDescription: it had just got dark when me and another person ( my girlfriends brothers friend ) were outside the front door and talking about seeing shooting stars at different times in the passed couple of weeks when suddenly a very bright light caught my eyes coming from the north . i pointed at it saying it was pretty high up to be a helicopter ( because it started to just hover ) and there was no sound to this light . it seemed way to close to earth and the light way too bright to be a sattelite ( i often see sattelites looking at the night sky and often map the night sky on my starry night program on my computer ) it is rare to see any aircraft at our location in the trinity alps of the new river . suddenly the light zig zagged right to left , right to left so fast ( i have never seen anything move so fast ) then suddenly stop and go straight up out of our atmosphere leaving a small vapor trail ( the object emitted no vapor trail until its sudden lightening speed departure into space ). we both yelled out oh my god ! that was a ufo ! i thought to myself maybe it is some new technology we have , but then thought why would something humans made have to leave our atmosphere so suddenly . the object made no sound moving or hovering . it was hard to determine the size as although it was clearly  in our airspace ( about half the altitude of a high flying commercial jet ) it was only visable as a very bright light .  it took me this long to report it because i thought it was insignifucant compared to other reports , but it was an event i will never forget .
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Me and another person witness a ufo event at beggining of nighttime

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down the street and noticed a friend and his mother starring at something in the sky.  i approached them and noticed a tiny black dot that they pointed out to me.  i went into my car and grabbed my camera with a long lense and began to take pictures of the craft.  it was below the clouds and over a mile out to the south-east.  i did not hear anything.  the craft was moving across the sky heading from the east to the south part of the sky, and at times appeared to move towards and away from us.  when i reviewed the images, the craft not only moved in vectors but seems to rotate around its own axis.  as the craft rotated it took on different shapes.  one image looks like a metallic blimp, when the next image looked like a saucer of some sort.  when another image looked more like the bottom of an iron.  i did not appreciate any lights coming from the craft but the sun did reflect off its skin. i also did not see any smoke or jet streams coming off the craft.  the whole moment lasted about 1 minute and a few seconds.  after the last picture i took the image vanished into thin air.

during the whole time i was standing in one spot taking the images.  each image taken was about 2-3 seconds apart.  took a total of 11 images in sequence.

i thought it was a balloon when i first looked at it.

i was not upset or anxious when seeing the craft.  i just did not know what it could be.  i showed the picts to many of my friends and co-workers and they can not explain what they see either because in each image the craft takes on a different look.

i would like to be contacted by mufon to discuss these images and would be glad to send them at that time.  they are quite large files and i am not sure how to upload them correctly to your site.  these images are in very good quality.  i may consent to release of info to third parties after discussing case with mufon.
content.shape: Blimp,   Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Cylinder,   Disc
content.summary: Multiple clear images taken of unknown craft in sky during a clear day.

content.detailedDescription:
There is a hot issue in my country. ufo was flied on jakarta city, the capital city of indonesia. 
http://www.Detiknews.Com/read/2009/10/19/160126/1224299/10/foto-ufo-di-jakarta-palsu
http://www.Yousaytoo.Com/ufo-flied-on-jakarta-city/111431

we know that this thing is still mysterious. ufo is mysterious object like a plan and it drive by alien. with a plate shape and many light window. the first time i saw the picture it looked real. and many people believed about this. and other people didn���t trust it. and there was telematics expert observed this picture and he said that this is unreal. but why the picture and the news spread in all my country. and many prediction was came that it connected with the disaster happened in indonesia. like before earthquake happened there was an ufo shown in the sky. do you believe about this myth?
content.summary: Ufo flied on jakarta city
content.locationName: Jakarta Capital Region, Jakarta Capital Region

content.detailedDescription:
i am an amateur astronomer with a 13 in diameter telescope. i have been viewing through this scope for about 15 years. i am a former pilot too
 i set up the scope in my backyard in nipomo california it was dusk at 6:35 pm i pointed my scope at what i thought was jupiter. (jupiter  turned out later was hidden from my view at the time by a tree) this event lasted at least 3 minutes.
i looked at the object it had roughly the same diameter as jupiter through my scope using an eyepiece that gives me 49 power.
 as i looked at the object which i thought was jupiter  there was what i thought one of the moons of jupiter the smaller object started moving back and forth above the larger object in about a 180 degree arc lasting about 1 second.
  i watched this go on for at least a minute. i checked my scope thought perhaps i was picking up a reflection. my optics were ok.
  as i looked at the two objects the smaller one appeared to shoot out a small beam of light, a laser? the color of the beam appeared to be a combination green and orange. 
  the smaller object continued to move back and forth in an arc above the larger object while aiming the beam. both objects stayed in my field of view they did not move as out of my field of view or were stationary in my field of view other than the smaller object shooting the beam moving back and forth above the larger object.
   i watched this beam shoot out of the larger object for close to another minute then the larger object exploded into at least 2 dozen pieces each a bright white like the original larger object.
  i then watched the object that shot the beam move slowly away from the debris cloud. i tracked it with my scope. it then appeared to take on an elongated shape a very dark red rust color it also had a flashing light at the rear.
  i moved my scope back to the debris cloud and back to the object that shot the beam a couple of times. then the debris cloud was gone and i lost the object that shot the beam.
  it was later after the incident was over that i realized that jupiter was still behind a tree in my backyard. 
  the object when i saw it was at the same elevation above the horizon but about 15 to 20 degrees north of jupiter.
  the object was almost in the constellatiion pegasus. 
    that is all i have i was the only one who saw it. i do not know what i saw i cannot explain it
content.summary: Two ufo's one large one small the small one used a beam to explode the big one

content.detailedDescription:
Was up briefly, looked out the window, and saw an object moving laterally and diagnolly ever 15 seconds or so. lights went from blue to white to red. it was not close, it was about the size of a large planet as far as relative size to me. it hovered and moved for at least an hour.It was definitely not a plane or helicopter or blimp. the sky was as clear as i've ever seen; you could see so many stars. there was zero light pollution. my wife saw it as well

has anyone else reported this?
content.summary: Object with changing lights overing then moving

content.detailedDescription:
I was stood in my parents back garden. the sun had set and there were only a few thin clouds. i saw a light on the horizon. it seemed to be around 90degrees off the normal flight path of jets going past my parent���s house. i see them all the time and always look out for them. i could not see any craft, just a star like light in the sky. it was on a perfectly straight trajectory and it seemed to be doing a very high speed.
when most planes go past my parent���s house, to the front and one side, the planes are leaving the airport and gaining altitude, to the back of the house, the planes are descending and preparing for their final approach.
the light that i saw did not seem to be slowing or changing its height. it was completely silent. i waited for it to get closer and fully expected for it to be a small plane with its landing lights on. as it got closer, the glare from the landing lights would lessen and i should be able to see the smaller lights on the wingtip and fuselage. at this point i was pretty sure it was a small military jet as it would explain the speed and lack of sound thus far.
as the light neared and i could see it from a 20 degree angle, the glare had not lessened. i realised that the light could not be from landing lights as they are directional. i watched one of the only hazy clouds in the sky as the light went beneath it. i thought it might have been a satellite reflecting light or omitting it. when i saw it pass under the cloud and realised it was obviously not a plane, helicopter or anything else i could identify, i pulled my mobile phone out and tried to record, but it didn���t work. i ran in the house and got my panasonic camera out. i turned on automatic stabilisation, this makes the light zip around the screen as i try and hold the camera steady. i tried to film with only a small zoom, but could not see it clear enough, so i made a new recording at 12x zoom as i filmed it continue on its trajectory until it disappears over the roof tops.
during the entire time that i saw the star like light in the sky i heard no sound of any type of engine, or any other sound at all that i thought was coming from this light. i could not make out any outline of an object behind or within the light. i did not see any other lights close to it or any silhouette. i viewed this object from two separate angles as it passed almost overhead. at all times the light stayed the same colour, shape, intensity, speed and trajectory. i watched it rise from one horizon and disappear over the other horizon and the whole thing lasted about 10-15 minutes.
content.summary: Single trajectory light at high speed, video recording

content.detailedDescription: I was actually kinda responding to a site from 10/17/2009 in colorado...Last halloween night i seen the exact/very very similar thing as they did. i was gettin home from a haunted hay ride. an i looked up as i got out of my car an i noticed the stars being coverd by a large stealth bomber type shape craft. no lights. no sound i only notticed it cuz it covered all of the stars the sighting lasted bout 10 seconds or so. it was very freaky. at first i thougght it was a top seccret plane but now im more convinced it was a ufo since some one else seen it. any questions plz e mail me [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Delta stealth bomber shape.

content.detailedDescription:
I went out side to look at the stars. it was an exceptionally clear night.
a few weeks earlier i was able to easily spot satellites and my girl friend who is 34 can clearly make them out too.
  i was watching a small plane cross the sky just north of john wayne air port. when watching the plane i noticed movement catch my eye. then i saw it. it traveled below the plane at high speed it was only visible because of the three points of light on the tips and the way that it blocked out the stars as a solid object would. i may have been only 30 feet long or so.
it traversed the whole sky in less than two seconds so excess of twenty miles per second or 1200mph. it also did one zig zag manuver that was impossible for a human to withstand. the forces of traveling from straight to horizontal then straight at that speed would kill you. so the pilot must somehow be immune to inertia. it looks like it moves with the thoughts of the pilot. it made no sound and left no trail. i am very sure about what i saw. i feel like it must have somehow been related to the sighting in sad diego that occured at exactly the same time. the craft was definitely in a hurry to get somewhere. what also strikes me as strange was it seemed like as soon as i was tracking it. was when it zig zagged and then accelerated out of sight.
 approximately 10 seconds after the object went over. two helicopters flew across the area from the south in a wide circle scanning with spottlights all over in the air and ground. they made a wide turn circling back south towards the ocean.
content.summary: Black triangle lights on three corners

content.detailedDescription: On october 17th 2009 at approximately 10:10pm mst, two friends and i witnessed a silent, delta shaped object fly overhead.  we were in a backyard, near university & dry creek in centennial, watching over a puppy we were dog-sitting for the night when i noticed a strange, unlit object moving east to west across the sky.  the object appeared to be black or dark-gray in color, and i first noticed it because it blocked out stars while it passed overhead.  the object's ���wings��� appeared to have a series of circular, light gray dome shaped appendages on the bottom surface, which again were unlit.  there were not any clouds in the sky, so it was hard to estimate distance and size, but at best guess i���d say the object was roughly 150 feet across at a distance of 1,000-2,000 feet above the ground.  we watched the object pass overhead for 5-10 seconds until some trees blocked our view.
content.summary: Delta shaped object spotted over centennial

content.detailedDescription: I went to take my dog out to relieve himself before bed, and i was enjoy the beautiful clear, windy cool night, looking up at the clear sky at a very bright star, then i thought i saw next to it another flashing moving star, then i noticed it had  three lights flashing, that it was a moving object, at first it looked like the lights were in a row, 2 green and red light in the middle,then as it came closer, it seemed the red light was lower than the green, like a triangle facing down, the top two corners being green and the third point being red,it was extremely high up, i could not see the shape of the object, it appeared to be kind of oval, it flew towards the north, i followed it until it was over my house then i went inside to call my husband to come and take a look, he took about 3 minutes to come outside,but it was gone, it had dissapeared. i saw it in the far south side extremely high up and followed it come closer all the way to ontop of my house in about 1 minute, minute and a half. the lights rotated in flashing, they flashed like in a pattern. i was very speculative, i was wondering if it was a weather balloon, they always talk about people, misinterpreting what they see. i tried to researched what the wether balloons look like on the internet,and if they have lights, but most sites said they are  usually released during the day or at 12 pm and 12 am. this was before those time and the lights rotated a flashing sequenced, not just a simple flash. whatever it was it was not an airpalne.
content.summary: Flashing 2 green lights with red light in center extremely high moved

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving east towards manning drive (hwy 15) on 153 ave in edmonton, alberta, with my wife when we saw an unusually bright light in a near (if not) stationary position to the south of us (around 7:45pm), about 1.5 hands high from the horizon. it seemed to be quite large and brilliant, like a planet but slightly bigger and brighter without a shimmer, but we could see the clouds behind it. both of us thought it was odd but figured it was probably the police helicopter spot light in the distance. we both had our view of the light blocked by a house just before turning south onto manning drive, but when we past the house the light was gone. there were no blinking lights as customary with helicopters and airplanes.

a few minutes later i dropped my wife off to run her errands while i went to run mine. about 15 minutes later i was walking out of the blockbuster video store in clareview (137 ave and 40 st) towards my vehicle, looking westwards, when i saw a very similar light to the first one but this time it was moving, and in a different position than earlier.

the movement was absolutely bizarre! it was two lights now, the larger looking like the first light i saw with my wife, and the second looking much smaller and directly below the larger one. i'm accustomed to seeing helicopters in this area, they take off from cfb edmonton regularly, plus we have police and news choppers in town too. and i'm accustomed to seeing planes. this pair of lights moved like nothing i have ever seen. 

the smaller, lower one moved down like a yo-yo, but instead of going back up, the larger, higher light would pull towards it, losing altitude, at the same distance and speed the smaller light moved first. it looked organic! i mean, it was like watching a jellyfish move in slow-motion rewind. there were two other people in that area of the parking lot with me who had left the video store just steps ahead of me who noticed me standing there with my vehicle door open frozen and staring at the western sky, but i don't think they looked in the direction i was looking or really even gave me a second thought as they got in their car without pausing. i didn't feel any strong emotions like fear, but i was somewhat nervous.  i recall thinking "it must be huge, and moves so strangely, what the **** is that?"

after 8 of these yo-yo + pull down maneuvers the lights were behind a distant building about 300-500 metres away (for those familiar with clareview it would be the marble slab store from standing in front of blockbuster). i'm not sure of the distance it was away from me, but when the lights were blocked by the building the larger one was about pea sized, and i assume since there's nothing but parking lots and traffic for about 1.5 kilometres from me in the direction i was staring, that's pretty big. i got in my vehicle and drove out of the parking lot onto 137 ave going westbound as reasonably fast as i could to pick my wife up so we can search for the lights but wasn't able to locate them again.

i consider myself an objective person. i am fascinated by the ufo phenomena, but also try to reason out less exciting explanations first. in this case i've considered maybe it was a kite or balloon of some sort someone might have been playing with. it would have to be huge. what gets me though is it did not move like a typical aircraft or toy does. and those movements really looked natural, quite literally like a jellyfish swimming backwards.

it was just so bizarre!
content.shape: Circle,   Diamond,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Other
content.summary: Two lights moving together like a jellyfish.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving east towards manning drive (hwy 15) on 153 ave in edmonton, alberta, with my wife when we saw an unusually bright light in a near (if not) stationary position to the south of us (around 7:45pm), about 1.5 hands high from the horizon. it seemed to be quite large and brilliant, like a planet but slightly bigger and brighter without a shimmer, but we could see the clouds behind it. both of us thought it was odd but figured it was probably the police helicopter spot light in the distance. we both had our view of the light blocked by a house just before turning south onto manning drive, but when we past the house the light was gone. there were no blinking lights as customary with helicopters and airplanes.

a few minutes later i dropped my wife off to run her errands while i went to run mine. about 15 minutes later i was walking out of the blockbuster video store in clareview (137 ave and 40 st) towards my vehicle, looking westwards, when i saw a very similar light to the first one but this time it was moving, and in a different position than earlier.

the movement was absolutely bizarre! it was two lights now, the larger looking like the first light i saw with my wife, and the second looking much smaller and directly below the larger one. i'm accustomed to seeing helicopters in this area, they take off from cfb edmonton regularly, plus we have police and news choppers in town too. and i'm accustomed to seeing planes. this pair of lights moved like nothing i have ever seen. 

the smaller, lower one moved down like a yo-yo, but instead of going back up, the larger, higher light would pull towards it, losing altitude, at the same distance and speed the smaller light moved first. it looked organic! i mean, it was like watching a jellyfish move in slow-motion rewind. there were two other people in that area of the parking lot with me who had left the video store just steps ahead of me who noticed me standing there with my vehicle door open frozen and staring at the western sky, but i don't think they looked in the direction i was looking or really even gave me a second thought as they got in their car without pausing. i didn't feel any strong emotions like fear, but i was somewhat nervous.  i recall thinking "it must be huge, and moves so strangely, what the **** is that?"

after 8 of these yo-yo + pull down maneuvers the lights were behind a distant building about 300-500 metres away (for those familiar with clareview it would be the marble slab store from standing in front of blockbuster). i'm not sure of the distance it was away from me, but when the lights were blocked by the building the larger one was about pea sized, and i assume since there's nothing but parking lots and traffic for about 1.5 kilometres from me in the direction i was staring, that's pretty big. i got in my vehicle and drove out of the parking lot onto 137 ave going westbound as reasonably fast as i could to pick my wife up so we can search for the lights but wasn't able to locate them again.

i consider myself an objective person. i am fascinated by the ufo phenomena, but also try to reason out less exciting explanations first. in this case i've considered maybe it was a kite or balloon of some sort someone might have been playing with. it would have to be huge. what gets me though is it did not move like a typical aircraft or toy does. and those movements really looked natural, quite literally like a jellyfish swimming backwards.

it was just so bizarre!
content.shape: Circle,   Diamond,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Other
content.summary: Two lights moving together like a jellyfish.

content.detailedDescription: Blue colored ufo in same spot as previously reported about a month ago. slight quick movements. location southern shreveport
content.summary: Blue oval orb ufo in same spot for 2nd night

content.detailedDescription: There was one ufo hovering at first then started to move up and down irractlty then back and fourth. then another appeared from undernieth of the first one. two more came to view from under the other ones and they were there for a few minutes. myself and my roommate tried to follow them in my truck then they dissaperd. my roommate has video of the same ufo on youtube from 9/22/2009. she seen them around the same time as we did tonight. her video on youtube says ufos in pontiac michigan 09/22/09. her video shows only one we seen 4 tonight. thanks.
content.summary: Diamon shape blueish white color

content.detailedDescription: I was in hobbs motor sports park, walking through the staging lanes. when i heard a another quy ask "what's that in the sky?" there was a group of 4 guys that i did not know, i am from texas. they were looking at a light north east of the track about 35 degrees above the herizon. it was light blue and about a quater size of the moon and was stationary. i did a 360 and noticed that there was no stars visible in the sky. it was right at dusk. i watched the light for about 2 minutes just observing and listen to the guys talk. it stayed stationary so i walked 50 yards back to the pits where the race care was. checked the car over. i looked back at the sky and nothing was there and the sky was clear. roughly 15 minutes later i notice that the star were visible. off and on all evening i would check the sky trying to find the object, i never saw it again. i talked to my wife in abilene around midnight, and she kidded my about it. i woke up this morning and came home to find others had seen things in the same region around the same time i did. so i thought i would send this in.
content.summary: Light blue light north east of hobbs motorsport park at about 35 degree above ground quater size of full moon

content.detailedDescription: Red light in sky for 15-20 minutes in one spot. it looked like a star but it was bright red. it moved erratically with the wind at times.   it was not a helicopter because it did not make any noise.  then a small white light came out in front of it then the object shot off to the east very quickly.  i wonder if anyone else saw it?  it looked like it was over nw cicero, illinois.  i live in south oak park to the north and west of where i saw it.  i did get it on film.  i have to figure out how to up load it.  i can then forward it to you.
content.summary: Red stationary light in sky.

content.detailedDescription: My sighting began saturday evening sept 12 at 7:56 pm. my wife my two nephews and myself were sitting on our deck out back of our house . myself and my two nephews were sitting on chairs at the table. my wife was standing against the deck rail about three feet from me. it was a crystal cleae warm night. as i was talking to my wife, i noticed a small white ball appear in the sky to the right of my wifes head. it was about three houses down from mine and about one hundred feet high. asi was watching this thing icouldnt understand what was playing out to me as i watched. my nephews started screaming what in the world is that. as we watched the ball of light started to stretch out into a big flat teardropimage that was being blown up from another dimension. it looked like this thing was being filled up with bright white particles. the whole time this sparkly stuff was being blown into this tear drop shaped object it was flapping like a flag blowing in the wind.Thirty seconds after being inflated with this bright shiney particles, itwas a large whitish yellow ball about fifteen to twenty foot round sphere just sitting still in the sky. a few seconds after this sphere developed, a dark bluish purple mist or fog like substance started eminating from the bottom of this sphere. after about fifteen seconds of this mist coming out the bottom of this thing, theonly thing you could see was the top two thirds of the sphere sticking out the top of this fog.After another ten seconds of this fog coming out the bottom of this sphere it covered the sphere completely. at that very second these very bright spot lights shot out the bottom of this sphere. it looked like it ha very bright shiny glitter inside the beam of light that wentthe whole way down to the ground. after sitting there for about forty five seconds with thespot light shing down, the spotlight and the sphere blinked out at the exact same time. the only thing left was the blue mist. we thought clouds rolled in because we couldnt see any stars. the color of the fog was the exact same color as the night time sky. the fog took about twenty seconds to dissapate. when it was gone, it was like nothing was ever there.I am stll amazed with what happened.My wife is a non beleiver and keeps saying it was an airplane or helicopter or blimp. iforgot to mention that there was no sound at all. it was completely silent. i still sit out back hoping it reappears.My wife thinks im crazy, but i think i am lucky to have experience this sighting.
content.summary: Teardrop shaped object looked like it was being squeezed out from another dimension in the dark to search for something with its bright spotlights.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving to a local park on saturday afternoon. i always take pictures of the sky and landscapes when we take long drives. i noticed something very stunning, a bright light flashing in the afternoon sky. 

it was about 4:30pm. we were driving along the i15 freeway near the 1st exit to corona when i first noticed it. i thought maybe it was a small plane, but then i zoomed in x4 to x16 and all i could see was this cigar shape or elongated oval shape glinting every few seconds. 

i took several pictures over five minutes, as it changed into a round oval shape with a massive glowing light emitting from it. after about a minute it seemed lose its beautiful glow and became more dull. i then noticed a small cloud or gray object that seemed to be staying near it and at times going away from it. then suddenly, they both were gone. i could no longer find either of them in the sky. before they faded my husband reminded me to zoom back out and to attempt to get photos of something nearby to contrast the object.

when i got home i viewed the pictures, blew them up and contrasted them with various pictures taken of planes at a similar distance. you can always see the wing and or tail, this object was mainly light, no tail or wing.
content.summary: Glinting light, flashing light caught my attention ...Seemed to change...Huge glowing light appeared

content.detailedDescription: Spoted six ligth from i-10 west at watson rd, going south movingslow about a 1000 ft.The ligth where about 1/4 of a mile apart. took pic. at the end of miller rd at river bed. see pic and you tell me what this is.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Six ligths over the city at about 1000 ft

content.detailedDescription:
This happened many years ago while i am uncertain of the exact date or time i was about 6 years old and we lived in bayview tx. the housing complex we lived at was used by federal employees as my father was with the border patrol and worked at the immigration base just down the road. 26.150245,-97.35035 will put you exactly where i was standing at the time. we moved out of the base in 74 so this had to have happened sometime in the fall or early winter in 73 as i wasn't allowed out very late being i was only about 6 but it was after dusk and was dark - there were many stars out and i was going to a friends just a few houses over when i had that feeling you get that stands all the hair on your neck and arms up and i froze and spun around and there it was.

a huge triangle as big as a football field floating straight toward me from the west, it was over the open field across the street and moving very slow like it was just floating totally silent.  i was transfixed and scared to run inside to get someone because i was amazed and afraid to look away so i stood there and watched it float straight at and over me and once i was looking straight up at it i spun around on the spot and watched it until it went out of site straight toward the bay and gulf. the whole time couldn't have been more than about 10 minutes or so but seemed much longer.  this thing was also very low only a few hundred feet up if even that high.  i could not make out any markings or distinct features from the underside other than to say it appeared matte black, no reflections from street lamps or anything of the sort, the only way i know it was solid was that it blotted out a good portion of the stars.

this thing had 3 bright white lights on each tip and one yellow/amber/orange light that was not dead center but between the center and the back 2 lights kind of if it were a chevron. the night was clear and all the stars were out and it blotted them from the sky so i know it was actually a triangle shape but the amber light was not centered but toward the rear halfway from center to the back.  the amber light was the one that was so strange as it was constantly shifting like looking at a mirage or heat from the road ahead, just shifted with all 3 colors never really yellow orange or amber but all and none at the same time just constantly shifting.  

i have never seen another one again but after talking to my sister she tells me that all the kids(older) used to lay out in the open field in the block and watch them, she tells me she never saw one down low but always up fairly high and that they would just disappear and she never could point it out to someone else because they were gone to fast.
content.summary: Huge triangle, 3 white lights and one amber. low, slow coasted right over me noisless

content.detailedDescription:
Ore 21:20, zona trobaso a verbania,
avvistati due "corpi" luminosi, uno pi��� grande di forma triangolare, come se fosse la luce della luna attraverso le nuvole, e una pi��� a desta come una stella, si muovevano a velocit��� diverse, quella simile a una stella pi��� veloce e l'alta pi��� lentamente la seguiva, ad un certo punto quella simile alla stella f��� uno sbuffo, e lascia una scia pi��� grande simile all'altra scia, poi smette di "sbuffare" e prosegue, si seguono ancora per qualche minuto,e poi spariscono,non ��� durato tutto per 10 minuti o 15,mai visto una cosa simile, e la scia che lasciavano non era paragonabile a quella di un aereo, perch��� era molto,ma molto pi��� larga!
content.summary: Scia luminosa triangolare e luce simile a una stella che si seguono

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 10:15pm oct.16th.We were playing cards with our neighbors. when they left the house, my neighbor saw a royal blue light flashing.   and yelled to come out and see the flashing blue light.We used the cell phones to record and also two digital cameras that recorded the object.
 
we continued to monitor the object and at times you can clearly see three lights that form a triangle and then it would move in erratic motion the light would dim then it would get brighter appearing as a circle.
 
i thought it was a helicopter at first, but it was to high in the sky and moving to fast in different directions.It was a vivid royal blue color. we lost the object in the clouds.
content.summary: Blue object in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and a friend came across a ufo while driving to work. the object was 6 miles south of carlisle at time stated above.

the object was at an altitude of around 500ft (i know this as we managed to pass the object within 200yards of passing the roundabout/rotary)

we pulled over to get a better look at this very strange glowing object which was moving very slowly across avery clear night sky, we managed to get a photo of this object using a 8 mega pixal camera phone. while we were watching the object another car pulled up from which an old women got out and asked if we were watching the ufo (thank god someone else saw this)we said yes and tried to get some movie footage using the camera phone again. as we did this the object faded away!!!!!

the strange thing is we had a wierd feeling the object was still there??

after a few minutes we decided it was time to get to work so headed off to carlisle. around 100 yards down the road we were still looking into the sky to relocate the object when all of a sudden it reappeared from nothing and shot off in a northerly direction at what can only be described as impossible speed (i have seen the euro fighter quite regulary as the raf train for operations abroard in my local area) the object we saw was on a very different level altogether!!!!

hope this sheds some light!!
content.summary: Egg shaped ufo at 500ft altitude..

content.detailedDescription:
Last night i very clearly observed a ufo of a type commonly referred to as a black triangle (a term i had not heard of until today, sunday october 18th). 

at approximately 9:30 pm mt saturday october 17th, mountain time (rough estimate), as i was walking in the alley behind my house just north of mile high stadium in denver, i happened to look up at the sky to see three points of light, arranged roughly in an equilateral triangle formation (if viewed from an oblique angle), moving extremely rapidly across the sky, in approximately the north to south direction. the object(s) were roughly west of me. the speed seemed very high, at least compared to what i expect of a commercial airliner traveling at high altitude at cruising speed or low altitude on approach to dia. i would estimate that a typical military fighter would have to be traveling very fast and very low to have the same apparent velocity that the three points of light had (having had experience with low military aircraft flyovers of bronco���s games at mile high).

it is hard to estimate how long the three points were visible to me, but i would guess perhaps 3-5 seconds.

the sky was extremely clear that night, with no visible clouds.
 
in terms of size and intensity the points of light appeared very similar to stars, but without any oscillation in the apparent magnitude (i.E., they did not twinkle). the points had the brightness of a middle bright star, i.E., they were very obvious, but there were both brighter and dimmer stars visible in the sky. the lights were definitely white, not red or green or blinking white as you'd expect from commercial or general aviation aircraft. there was no point of light in the middle of the triangle. 
 
the three points seemed to be arranged in an equilateral triangle formation for the majority of the time that they were visible to me, however, as they receded into the distance to the south, the triangle formation collapsed. i cannot say for sure if the orientation of the objects was equilateral or not given the uncertainty of the object's orientation with respect to my viewing position on the ground. it is also impossible to tell if the three points were on the same object, or if they were three separate objects. the collapse of their apparent triangle orientation could have either been a single object rotating or three separate objects changing their position with respect to each other. i listened intently for any sound, expecting to hear jet engines, but there was no audible sounds at all above the ambient noise of the highway (i-25, a couple hundred yards to the east of my position).

the object(s) were certainly not satellites, whose slow constant motion across the sky i am very familiar with.

it is impossible for me to give an estimate of the size of the object or the distance between the points of light as there was no frame of reference available. if i assume that it was a single object, i could not discern any outline to the object as it appeared black against a black sky.

searching for more information on this, i found the 1990 brussels video, and what i saw over denver looked very much like that. the primary difference between my sighting and the brussels video is that the object(s) that i saw were not moving slowly or hovering. when i saw it, it was moving very fast in a straight line until it was out of sight.
 
i have seen other rare phenomena in the sky, including a soviet rocket engine entering the atmosphere, appearing as a large fireball, and another large fireball that i assumed was a large meteor, but this was absolutely nothing like that. these were three discrete points of light traveling rapidly and in synchronized formation, without trails, without sound.

personally, i am an extremely skeptical individual and if i were to hear a similar report, i would normally attribute it to either a meteorological phenomenon, or to simple psychological misinterpretation of the scene, which is very common given our brain's inherent pattern seeking mechanisms that lead us to find patterns where none really exist. however, in this case, neither of those explanations is plausible to me. this is one of the strangest things i have ever seen in the night sky, and i can honestly say that i have no idea what it was.
content.summary: Three points of light flying in formation at high speed
